https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iNHZmpAoyMgxMYHfT6Uq8ZLtwSo.jpg Muthupandi is in search of Aishwarya, his teenage daughter, who goes missing after her private video gets leaked online. Can the innocent father trace his daughter, and identify the culprits responsible for putting him in this situation? Chithirai Sevvaanam
